name: vamp
description:
GAME INSTRUCTION: there is vampire that is trying to get to the end of the map which is your house so that he can eat you, so you have to either put "garlic: on" which will make the vampire be paralyzed and cannot reach your house but that costs power and once the power runs out you lose. When you have turned "garlic: off" that means the vampire could move toward your house.  

controlls:                                                                                                                                                                            Z = "GARLC: ON"                                                                                                                                                        X= "GARLIC: OFF"
